h2_title: Yaoguai Queen Boss Fight - Kang-Jin Loong
content: If she starts to rapidly fly in circles, dodge back and you'll avoid a whirlwind attack that has a fairly large range outside of her actual body.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Queen Boss Fight - Kang-Jin Loong'.
The content is as follows:
If she starts to rapidly fly in circles, dodge back and you'll avoid a whirlwind attack that has a fairly large range outside of her actual body.
